Events that occurred on 7 January.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1913 - Voice actor Francis de Wolff is born.
1937 - At the request of his father, young Rayner Unwin writes a book report on Farmer Giles of Ham.
1945 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 94a.
1948 - Voice actor Jarion Monroe is born.
1966 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 283.
1966 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Roger Shaw.
1970 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to his grandson Michael George Tolkien.
2004 - Dutch translator Willy Wielek-Berg dies.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 3019:
The Fellowship of the Ring travels south along the Misty Mountains.
